nodes.text: Mike Richardson, with Randy Stradley, wrote the comics Crimson Empire and Crimson Empire II: Council of Blood. He was scheduled to also co-write Crimson Empire III, but it was canceled. In 2010, Crimson Empire III was announced to be once more in production, with Richardson and Stradley on writing.
Richardson also published the Dark Horse Comics collection Star Wars: Luke Skywalker, Last Hope for the Galaxy.
